website_summaries.verdict: This is a solid kit for those who quickly want to get serious about yoga.
pros: Comes with a non-flaking, TPE mat, yoga instruction DVD, 2 blocks, 2 microfiber towels, a strap, and a black carrying case
Carrying case, which most kits don’t have
Better blocks than in some other kits
cons: Mat seems to be the weak spot of this kit, with complaints about its durability and rolling on the ends
DVD doesn’t work for some people

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised, but decent quality. I bought this specifically bc it said half inch xtra thick mat and 8ft yoga strap. Instead it is quarter inch may and 6ft strap. Dimensions of towels are also incorrect. They are 14.5x23 inches and 24x72 inches. Will give it a chance and post update if works out, but probably need to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything is well made and I like that it comes with 2 sturdy yoga blocks and ...
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with everything you need. Everything is well made and I like that it comes with 2 sturdy yoga blocks and 2 soft, absorbent towels. The mat itself has a nice, almost suede feeling to it. My only complaint is that the mat is a bit too stretchy so certain positions become more difficult to maintain as your feet or hands are slowly sliding further apart.
customer_reviews.author: bac527

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Yogi in Training
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner yogi and this is definitely a perfect way to start. I’ve been to classes but now I can enjoy yoga at home at my own pace. Everything seems to be very well made and I’m excited to use these. The bag has some iffy zippers but they zip fine for now. That’s not why I bought the set so I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: All around good quality. I was a little concerned that the carrying bag would be thin and cheap and wondered if spending a little extra on this set would be worth it. It was. I took it out to a park and discovered that I love the way the bag opens and has little pockets inside for my other stuff. I may be a little too excited over the bag it came in; please note the mat, blocks, straps and towels are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Marie

customer_reviews.title: All great except mat
customer_reviews.text: The towels, blocks, strap and bag are really nice but the mat is always rolled at the ends and never gets flat. Good set for beginners tho.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: First, this product is fantastic! High quality mat and accessories that are perfect for any yoga person. Whether you are an avid yoga person or just beginning these products are great. If you’re a beginner, the dvd is helpful in getting started and use to yoga. For those who do hot yoga, this mat is perfect and holds up well along with the absorbent towels included. With the handy travel/storage bag with extra pockets for personal items, this is a no brainer purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This kit includes everything listed and everything is high quality. One of the biggest selling points for me was that they also include an instruction video for those just starting into yoga, which is easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: MacCanine

customer_reviews.title: Overall order
customer_reviews.text: The products are sturdy quality material and well made. The ability to have a carrying case makes it very easy to keep everything together and carry when needed. There has been attention to detail and there are no anomalies in any of them which sometimes happens with products. The staff is very carrying and solicit feedback as well as follow-ups to ensure the customer is happy. I highly recommend the product and this company :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: The product all in all is OK. I’ve had the mat for weeks now and it still has a bad smell that it came with. I’ve even tried to use mat cleaner and haven’t been able to get rid of the smell. It is non slip which I’ve liked, but it holds a lot of dirt that looks terrible on the black. I ended up purchasing another brand because I just couldn’t come to terms with this one.
customer_reviews.author: amber dipietro

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied..Great Quality !
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a perfect way to start if you're new to yoga, it would also make a great gift for a yogi...the blocks are sturdy, the mat is long, the strap is actually thick, and the microfiber towels are soft and absorbent. The carrying bag also has some storage pockets inside which is a plus when going to the gym, park, class, etc. Came with everything shown, Would recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Merry.S

customer_reviews.title: All items needed to start yoga and go to advance levels. All high quality.
customer_reviews.text: All high quality. All you need to go from beginning to advanced levels in one kit. Compact and all items fit in a bag. Matt is high density but allows elbows and knees to be used on hard surfaces. there is a matt only carry strap. The stretching aid strap is about 8 feet long with plastic strap tighter at one end.
customer_reviews.author: BSherwood

customer_reviews.title: Great for a New Year New Me Resolution
customer_reviews.text: I am doing my New Year New Me Resolution. It is not easy to get everything you need together to make that goal achievable. This kit did an awesome job of putting it all in one place for me! This is my start up yoga kit right off the bat! Perfect for someone just starting to do Yoga and trying to get everything together necessary to make it a success. Love my new yoga set!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Foutch

customer_reviews.title: I love the set
customer_reviews.text: I love the set! The mat is much nicer than I expected! The blocks are good quality. Arrived quickly and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has everything a beginner would need. As someone starting out with yoga I loved this set but unfortunately do not get to use it too often. With that being said, it’s only been used a handful of times and the mat has bubbles in it and won’t stay flat. I’m sad because like I said, I truly enjoyed it at first but really can’t use it much anymore. It would definitely be worth the money if I was to get more use out of it but considering now I have to buy a new mat I’d say not so much. :/
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for new Yogi! It includes everything you need to get started and I felt like a pro when I opened my bag at yoga class. Everyone asked where I purchased my gear! I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Diva

customer_reviews.title: Complete set!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use this product yet. I'm excited for my first class though! Everything that was supposed to be included was.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Ky Canton

customer_reviews.title: Disc will not play
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the disc will not play in my dvd player. Other than that I love all of the items and the carrying case it all comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R

customer_reviews.title: Mat bubbled up in my car😪
customer_reviews.text: Well i live in Ohio and i have always kept yoga mats in the car. This mat melted and bubbled up😪. I am very disappointed. So i would say the yoga mat does not hold up. I can not use it as it is disorted. I am late at writing this because when i bought it i was finishing school so it did not move from my room for months but when i actually started using it did not hold up. This mat was ruined by May.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to get started with yoga, all the general tools most anyone will suggest having for most basic and general poses. Good quality too, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good deal for what you get. I love the carrying case - it has inner straps to keep everything in place during transport. Other than that, it's a good, cushy mat, and standard yoga blocks. I haven't really used the towels but they seem like good quality. I also like the strap and the fact that it has a smaller travel strap for the yoga mat. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I love my Yoga set kit! I loved the price for all that comes with the kit. I also love that I can easily put away(and take out) everything, so it is not laying all over the house. The mat is the perfect thickness and with it being black and grey it cuts down on visible dirt-which was one of the reasons I wanted this color. I love the cloth and towel; I use them both and the blocks give the perfect height for my deeper stretches.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dedicated dancer!
customer_reviews.text: Love that set is so organized with straps to hold the blocks and other items in their seperate spaces.. also like the extra pockets inside bag to store extra items... purchased this set as a xmas gift for my daughter (who dances with a competition team), cannot wait for her to open and use on xmas day. Will update more information on use then. Thanks LEVOIT and AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: Legacy Black

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome set. Really great quality and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa robson

customer_reviews.title: Everything all in one
customer_reviews.text: Great beginners kit. It came with everything my wife needed to get started doing yoga. Packaged well and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my wife
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife, and she seems to like it very much, thus far. She stated the mat did not slip, and she loves the blocks, straps, towels, and bag. Also she likes that there is a separate strap, for if she just wants to carry her mat.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Bryant

customer_reviews.title: the yoga equipment is really nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: the yoga equipment is really nice and good quality. My only complaint is that the dvd that came with it does not work in my dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: Warm Cup of Battery Acid

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised with the quality of all the items in this pack especially the carry bag. Lots of internal pockets that I wasn't even expecting. Great product and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cainnic Orel

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Love the set and use it daily. Easy to clean mat. Nice towels and props.
customer_reviews.author: migs

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Definitely worth the money. Good quality product. Would like if they added some categories to the DVD like yoga for the low back, hip, core, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mlcak

customer_reviews.title: what a great bad full of goodies
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great bad full of goodies. i love this setup. i would of liked a better color at first but the black is more of a charcoal color and works great for me. The pad is great, no strong odor. i love this kit. I have no made it to the dvd that came with it as i have been using a different yoga dvd i am use to.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle95

customer_reviews.title: Hightly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This purchase had just about everything I needed for my new Yoga Classes. A large thick mat, towels, exercise and yoga mat straps plus two blocks came in a nice case with an adjustable carrying strap. I just put my yoga socks, keys and money in the zippered inner compartments and was set to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday in my hot yoga class and have zero complaints
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley love this kit. Just started learning yoga and am loving it. I really enjoy the DVD that comes with the kit, the one session on the DVD is easy to understand and learn the poses, really wish there were more videos to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials used
customer_reviews.text: Cool starter set. Bag will not stay zipped but contents are cool.
customer_reviews.author: Latrice Love

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set.
customer_reviews.text: It had everything i needed in a nice carry bag, mat is wide and long, and does not slip. Quality for the price is will worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MzSnchz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not a lot of instructions but plenty ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my daughter, she loves it! Good quality, not a lot of instructions but plenty of videos online.
customer_reviews.author: 3pupsplus

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners! The mat and towel is a good quality. Everything you need to get started. Very happy !
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife for yoga classes. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginner's light use only
customer_reviews.text: Did not have a lot of padding. Nice kite but started to fall apart in 2 weeks of 3 x a week Yoga practice.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fast shipping, and great order. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MsR

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap
customer_reviews.text: So far the product seems great, the only thing is that one of the hooks for the bag that carries it is broken. It was a big disappointment due to the bag being one of the main reasons I selected the product.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Elegant set
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb set! It is nice and the case was unexpected and holds everything wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: What a great setup! Nicer quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: What a great setup! Nicer quality than I expected. Definitely worth it and has everything I need for my yoga classes. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dana  Trabun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality arrived on time lots of good stuff for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Star

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect for my yoga practice, very complete yoga set. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Nice package for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. I was hoping the mat by be a little thicker , but so far it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Remote Working

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: my mom loves it. i hope they bring it back so i can get myself one
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ... even though it isn't as "cute" because of the amazing
customer_reviews.text: My wife steals my set even though it isn't as "cute" because of the amazing quality
customer_reviews.author: EGF

customer_reviews.title: Personal Yoga Area
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the organization of the product. Everything fit perfectly in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Artist

customer_reviews.title: Ripped bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag is damaged. I did not even look at the other products yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: i like it the only thing is the cd never came with the rest of the pack
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Missing Item
customer_reviews.text: When I "got" this item, all I received was an empty box.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Cadillac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! everything I needed is all in one package.
customer_reviews.author: mai

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The quality was amazing for the price! I would recommend the yoga set ✔💯
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The Black Color is Unique😍
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Yoga Set😍💓 Wish can find a Yoga Wheel as same as this.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Beginner yogi
customer_reviews.text: Excited to start my yoga journey with the LEVOIT kit. Great quality and all the pieces I need to begin.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Samodell

customer_reviews.title: The DVD does not work. What do we need ...
customer_reviews.text: The DVD does not work. What do we need to do to get another one? Having a hard time finding a way to contact you. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: Very thoughtfully designed kit and comes with everything you may need for yoga. Its like Yoga in a bag!! Have only used it for a week now but satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: MamtaLovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged and organized LOVED the color and the quality Highly rcommended
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and organized LOVED the color and the quality Highly rcommended
customer_reviews.author: Stt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Can't beat the price or the quality of this set.
customer_reviews.author: april

product_meta.title: LEVOIT Premium Yoga Set Kit, 8 Pieces Equipment, Includes 1 TPE Yoga Exercise Mat,1 Instruction DVD, 2 Yoga Blocks,2 Yoga Towels,1 Carrying Bag & Strap, Perfect Gift for Yogi & Beginners
product_meta.description: Levoit Lotus Premium Yoga Set Kit, 8 Pieces Equipment, Includes 1 Premium TPE Yoga Mat, 2 Yoga Blocks,2 Yoga Towels,1 Stretch Strap,1 Instruction DVD,1 Carrying Bag & Strap,Perfect Gift For Yogis
feature_bullets: Start with a full set! Premium 8-piece set includes: 1 yoga mat, 2 yoga blocks, 1 yoga mat towel, 1 yoga hand towel, 1 stretch strap, 1 carry strap, 1 thoughtfully designed carrying case. BONUS: 1 free professional DVD teaching video included!

The ultra-thick yoga mat is made with high-density, non-toxic, anti-tearing TPE material. Non-slip surface enhances traction and allows you to maintain balance as you exercise. Enjoy extra safeguard from injury. Includes an integrated carry strap.
Provide support and balance with our durable foam yoga blocks. Deepen your stretches and poses with our 8-ft yoga strap that improves overall flexibility & balance at any practice level.
Our 72”x24” and 24”x15” yoga towels are made of 100% microfiber and feature prime absorption to provide slip-resistant and sweat-free workouts

Enjoy immediate video instruction! We consulted a local yoga expert to show you the ropes! Beginners and well-seasoned yogis alike can enjoy a 30-minute yoga flow, totally complimentary of Levoit Yoga Essentials.
Designed to be beautiful and functional for yogis, yet adaptable enough for multi-use (e.g., daily exercise and workout routines, resting, protective floor covering for children, outdoor activities).
